options.accessibility.high_contrast_bloc: Enhances the block outline contrast of the targeted block.
options.pinpal.blockoutlines.outer_opaci: Controls how transparent the outer border lines color is on the targeted block.
options.pinpal.blockoutlines.inner_opaci: Controls how transparent the inner line color is on the targeted block.
options.pinpal.blockoutlines.outer_color: Controls the color of the outer border lines on the targeted block.
options.pinpal.blockoutlines.inner_color: Controls the color of the inner line on the targeted block.
